short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom keyboard shortcuts for ChatGPT: set keys to scroll up or down, copy, join all responses, new chat, and toggle the sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rate 5 ★s in chrome store if you dig it. Don't report bugs unless they persist >30 days. This is not my job, folks. Feature suggestions that I like in 5★ reviews are often implemented.✌️

Q: How do I customize the keyboard shortcuts? 
A: Click the extension icon, then reload the page.

Q: What are the default keyboard shortcuts?
A: Use alt on windows or option on a mac. Default shortcuts:
- Alt+a: Scroll up one message.  
- Alt+f: Scroll down one message.  
- Alt+t: Scroll to top.  
- Alt+z: Scroll to bottom.  
- Alt+s: Toggle sidebar.  
- Alt+c: Copy the lowest visible response. 
- Remove Markdown on Copy: *NEW* Option to strip Markdown formatting (e.g., *, #) when copying. Uncheck in settings to disable.
- Alt+e: Edit the previously sent message.  
- Alt+d: Resend the edited message.  
- Alt+n: Start a new conversation.  
- Alt+k: Search chats.  
- PageUp/PageDown Takeover: make your keyboard's PageUp and PageDown keys scroll the conversation instead of the box where you type. Uncheck in settings to disable. *NEW* Improved scrolling.
- Alt+w: Focus on the chat input.  
- Alt+q: *NEW* Toggle Search the Web Button.  
- Alt+g: Join & copy all responses (without the prompts).  
- Alt+h: Join & copy all code boxes.  

Q: Any other options or features?  
- Shrinks the UI and hides "teams" advertisements and other clutter, ideal for small laptop screens.  
- Settings to hide buttons added by this extension, disable the PageUpDown Takeover, and disable markdown removal.  
- Option to add custom text between each response when using the "copy all responses" feature.

---
---

Q: Something isn't working with the extension. This feels like violence to me. What now?
A: If something breaks, I send fixes every ~30 days (and usually within a week, because I use the extension myself).

Changelog:
• 1/4/2025: Copy shortcut key customization was broken. Fixed now.
• 1/3/2025: New features for the new year. Now strips markdown when using the copy shortcut (with option to disable). Added shortcut to toggle search the web button. Added option to disable pageup pagedown takeover, and greatly improving responsiveness to multiple presses. Improved performance in several areas.
• 12/11/2024: Wrapped menu text bugged out.
• 12/10/2024: Added shortcut for native search chats feature. Faded the native buttons below search box. Fixed the sidebar date separators and made sidebar header more compact. Hid the sidebar teams ad again.
• 12/02/2024: Fixed send edit alt-d key from not updating after changing in settings. Still working on the bugs for the copy all response user separators (mostly working but not perfect). 
• 12/01/2024: Sorry folks. Changing or deleting default shortcuts should work now. Deleting a default key will restore default chrome behavior.
• 11/25/2024: Added scroll down one message at a time. If already at last message, it will scroll all the way to bottom
• 11/17/2024: Added shortcuts for entering edit mode and resending edited messages. 
• 9/22/2024: Added shortcut to focus chat input. Fixed the options toast notifications. Updated extension description text to tickle your perineum. 
• 9/20/2024: Fixed sidebar toggle shortcut.
• 9/6/2024: Resolved sidebar, new conversation, and copy shortcuts.
• 7/21/2024: Fixed CSS bugs; added options to hide menus and native ? button. 
• 5/21/2024: UI bugs fixed; user menu functional; header improvements pending.
• 5/15/2024: Restored shortcuts affected by website design changes.
• 5/10/2024: Fixed alt+C shortcut (activates lowest visible copy button).
• 5/3/2024: Resolved domain redirect issue; restored join and copy all code features.
• 4/23/2024: Fixed scroll-up function shortcut.
• 4/5/2024: Added 'scroll to top' shortcut.
• 3/19/2024: Fixed custom GPT icon alignment.
• 3/18/2024: Added shortcut for toggling sidebar.
• 3/17/2024: Fixed scrolling to bottom; addressed formatting issues and bugs.
• 1/11/2024: Fixed copy and new conversation shortcuts; corrected separator usage to \n.
• 12/10/2023: Adjusted CSS for sticky header; fixed sidebar arrow.
• 11/28/2023: Restored alt+C; added alt+n for new GPT conversation; removed broken alt+d feature.
• 11/4/2023: Restored alt+C; fixed multiple HTML-related bugs; improved scroll down function.
• 9/15/2023: Included material design menu icons SVG; added Alt+D shortcut for scrolling to bottom; integrated native share and ? buttons.
• 7/28/2023: Optimized class modifications for model name relocation to footer.
